title: Everything You Need to Know about Rocket Fruit in Blox Fruits

steps.title: Cost:
steps.content: Cost: Rocket is a common natural-type Fruit that costs 5,000 belli or 50 Robux. Rocket Fruit is always in stock with the Blox Fruit vendor NPC that you can find in: Pirate Starter Island Marine Starter Island Docks of Kingdom of Rose (Second Sea) Caf√© (Second Sea) Mansion (Third Sea) Port Town (Third Sea)

steps.title: Usage:
steps.content: Usage: Rocket is the cheapest Fruit in the game and is always in stock, so it's one of the best Fruits you can get when you're just starting Blox Fruits (see this wikiHow article for more on rankings of Fruits in Blox Fruits. You'll see that there are other Fruits that you can get later on in the game, or when you're not a new player, that are stronger). Rocket Fruit replaced Kilo and is very similar to Bomb.

steps.title: Missile First/Z.
steps.content: Missile First/ Z . 1 mastery. You fire a small rocket from your hand, dealing damage and knockback to any enemy players.

steps.title: Air Strike/X.
steps.content: Air Strike/ X . 20 mastery. Shoot 5 rockets upwards and create targets at your cursor. The fired rockets then hit the targets and deal decent damage.

steps.title: Rocket Crash/C.
steps.content: Rocket Crash/ C . 50 mastery. You jump into the air and leap to your cursor, dealing AoE damage.

steps.title: Blast Off/F.
steps.content: Blast Off/ F . 75 mastery. Do a backflip into the air, leaving an explosive trail behind you. You can't Awaken this Fruit. As an added benefit, all the moves break Instinct . [1] X Research source
